summary: This is a response sheet from Cingular Wireless's National Compliance Center to a legal request dated August 1, 2006, regarding four target phone numbers. It provides subscriber and call detail records for the period from January 1, 2004, to the present, and outlines the legal requirements for obtaining cell site location information.

events.title: Legal Request to Cingular
events.description: A legal request was made to Cingular Wireless, likely by law enforcement, for information on four target phone numbers.

events.title: Cingular's Compliance Response
events.description: Cingular Wireless's National Compliance Center responded to the legal request, providing all available subscriber and call detail records for the target numbers from January 1, 2004, to the present.

keyFacts: Cingular Wireless received a legal request on August 1, 2006, for information on four target phone numbers.
The response, dated August 24, 2006, provided all available subscriber and call detail records from January 1, 2004, to the present.
Cell site location information would only be provided upon receipt of a Search Warrant, a Court Order under 'Specific & Articulable Facts,' or pursuant to 18 USC ยง2703(d).
The document is marked as confidential and intended only for the recipient of the legal request.
The document reference numbers are File Code: 227815 and EFTA00066569.
